parameter.fullname: Number times to read the CCD
Number of rows of the sensor
Number of columns of the sensor
Number of rows of the sensor
Number of columns of the sensor
Number of rows of the sensor
Number of columns in each segment to read
Number of rows to discard after subarray read
Number of columns to discard after subarray
Columns in second subarray, if any
Number of rows to read in overscan
Number of columns to read in overscan

function.fullname: Shift a pixel in the output register
Discard a pixel from the output register

Reverse shift a row in the image array
Discard a row from the image array
Read a pixel using binning factor of one

subroutine.fullname: Flush a single row off the CCD
Flush the entire image array once, FAST
Flush the entire image array, SLOWLY
